text:
Patrick Harvie (born 18 March 1973) is a Scottish politician. He is a co-leader of the Scottish Green Party. He is the leader of the party in the Scottish Parliament. The other co-leader is Lorna Slater.
He became a Member of the Scottish Parliament (MSP) for the Glasgow region at the elections in May 2003..
He was first elected co-convener of the Scottish Green Party in 2008.
